mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (MEMBER_CODE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, TASK_CODE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_EMAIL, ADDRESS, GENDER, MEMBER_ROLE, MEMBER_HIRE_DATE, MEMBER_END_DATE, INTRODUCTION,SIGNIFICANT , STATUS, BIRTHDAY, TEAM, FILE_CODE, PHONE) VALUES ( NULL, #{ deptCode }, #{ jobCode }, #{ taskCode }, #{ memberName }, #{ memberId }, #{ memberPWD }, #{ memberEmail }, #{ address }, #{ gender }, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{ memberEndDate }, #{ introduction }, #{ significant }, DEFAULT, #{ birthDay }, #{ team }, #{ fileCode }, #{ phone } )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_ROLE, MEMBER_EMAIL FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{ memberEmail }
